I'm using a tag to find related content, but I want to hide the post itself, so it does not display itself as related content. I don't see how to exclude it in set rec_posts so I tried to remove it in the loop itself. In the code below, line 39 renders the rec_post.name and 40 renders content.name but 41 renders nothing. I think I've missed something simple, or maybe there is a more elegant way to do this?
Hello :wave:  does anyone know if HubSpot has a localisation function to translate hardcoded strings? Thanks
